Key Match Events: Glenn Phillips entertains with his 50-ball 60 that razed a few more runs off the target, but eventually the gulf between the two sides was too much today.
Jansen's third wicket has brought in Neesham at No. 9 but his hand is bothering him.
Post-Match Reflections: At the top of the points table.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is also a big test for Trent Boult, who has a shockingly poor strike-rate of 51.3 in the powerplay and an even worse SR of 55.7 between overs 11-40 in ODIs in Asia.
Others: Tim Southee will be playing his first game of this World Cup, with Lockie Ferguson not yet recovering from injury.
South Africa bring in Kagiso Rabada on this surface since he's fit again, and out goes Tabraiz Shamsi.
